last_episode_to_air.name: Save Our Town
last_episode_to_air.overview: Gordon revitalizes three businesses in Ellicott City, Md., after flood damage in 2016 and 2018.

name: Gordon Ramsay's 24 Hours to Hell and Back
original_name: Gordon Ramsay's 24 Hours to Hell and Back
overview: Gordon Ramsay drives to struggling restaurants across the country in his state-of-the-art mobile kitchen and command center, Hell On Wheels, and tries to bring them back from the brink of disaster – all in just 24 hours.

episodes.name: Bella Gianna’s
episodes.overview: Gordon Ramsay travels to Congers, N.Y., where he visits a family-owned Italian restaurant called Bella Gianna's that is in desperate need of improvement.

episodes.name: The Old Coffeepot Restaurant
episodes.overview: Gordon Ramsay visits The Old Coffee Pot, which specializes in Cajun cuisine in New Orleans, and soon realizes that the staff lacks major accountability.

episodes.name: Brownstone Bistro
episodes.overview: Gordon Ramsay visits The Brownstone Bistro in Los Angeles, which specializes in Cajun fusion food.

episodes.name: Sherman's Restaurant
episodes.overview: Gordon Ramsay visits Sherman's Restaurant in Greenville, Miss., where he and the team find that the 30-year-old restaurant needs a new menu and new decor.

episodes.name: La Serenata
episodes.overview: Gordon Ramsay’s “Hell On Wheels” travels to La Serenata, a family-owned Mexican restaurant located in Los Angeles, CA.

episodes.name: Fetch Bistro
episodes.overview: Gordon Ramsay and his team visit a restaurant that aims to serve both dogs and people in Wichita, Kansas.

episodes.name: Patrick Molloy's
episodes.overview: Gordon Ramsay visits Patrick Molloy's, a family-owned restaurant and bar that is located on the Hermosa Beach pier in California.

episodes.name: Sandra Dee's Bar-B-Que & Seafood
episodes.overview: Gordon Ramsay and his team quickly realize that the owner of Sandra Dee's Bar-B-Que & Seafood lacks some much-needed discipline with her family members.

episodes.name: The Trolley Stop Café
episodes.overview: Gordon Ramsay's "Hell On Wheels" travels to the Trolley Stop Café, a classic Cajun-inspired restaurant located in the heart of New Orleans, LA

episodes.name: Shanty on 19th
episodes.overview: An iconic restaurant in Allentown, Penn., Shanty on 19th, has been a local presence for over four decades, but issues with restaurant staff and its owner threaten its future success unless Ramsay and his team can return the place back to glory.

episodes.name: Vasi's Restaurant and Bar
episodes.overview: Vasi's, a family-owned Italian restaurant in Waterbury, Conn., suffers from a disconnect between the head chef and restaurant owner that makes it difficult to implement much-needed updates, but Gordon and his team work to turn the restaurant around.

episodes.name: Catfish Cabin
episodes.overview: Gordon Ramsay and his team visit the Catfish Cabin in Memphis, Tenn., which offers traditional southern-style delicacies, but the waning morale of the passionate-yet-splintered team is causing a slew of problems for the success of the restaurant.

episodes.name: Stone's Throw
episodes.overview: Gordon and his team visit Stone's Throw, a family-owned restaurant that serves fine dining on the Housatonic River in Seymour, Conn., which suffers from stressed owners who have let their crew slack off too much for their restaurant to be a success.

episodes.name: Bayou on the Vine
episodes.overview: Gordon and his team visit the Bayou on the Vine, a family-run Cajun restaurant from Kansas City, Mo., where he quickly notices a challenging work environment created by the family dynamic that must be corrected for the restaurant's sake.

episodes.name: Boardwalk 11
episodes.overview: Gordon Ramsay and his team visit a Los Angeles gastropub and karaoke bar called Boardwalk 11, where there are strong issues that stem from the restaurant's staff and owner's lack of commitment, which makes the karaoke more appealing than the dining.

episodes.name: Los Toros Mexican Restaurant
episodes.overview: Gordon and his team visit the Los Toros Mexican restaurant in Los Angeles, where they discover an over-worked owner who struggles with high debt that is taking a toll on his health, but there could be hope for the owner with some fresh hope.

episodes.name: Social
episodes.overview: Ramsay and his team transform Los Angeles restaurant Social with renovations, a fresh new menu and hope for the future.

episodes.name: M'Dears Bakery & Bistro
episodes.overview: Ramsay and his team transform Los Angeles restaurant M'Dears Bakery & Bistro with renovations, a fresh new menu and hope for the future.

episodes.name: Lowery's Seafood Restaurant
episodes.overview: Gordon must revamp Lowery's Seafood, where his crew finds two brothers at odds.

episodes.name: Blend on Main
episodes.overview: Ramsay and his team give Blend on Main a spectacular renovation, a new menu and hope for the future.

episodes.name: Caneda's White Rooster
episodes.overview: Gordon revamps a Cuban-inspired restaurant in Tom's River, N.J.

episodes.name: Botto's Italian Line Restaurant
episodes.overview: Ramsay and his crew transform Botto's in Sweedsboro, N.J., with a spectacular renovation, a fresh new menu and hope for the future.

episodes.name: Seafarer's Family Restaurant
episodes.overview: Gordon and his team attempt to revamp Seafarer's, a seafood restaurant located in Manquin, VA.

episodes.name: Southern Kitchen
episodes.overview: Gordon and the team revamp a traditional Southern food restaurant located in Richmond, Va.

episodes.name: The Park Restaurant & Bar
episodes.overview: Ramsay tries to revamp a gastropub located in Oak Park, Calif.

episodes.name: Bear's Den Pizza
episodes.overview: Gordon revamps Bear's Den Pizza

episodes.name: South Boulevard
episodes.overview: Gordon revamps South Boulevard, a Korean-inspired restaurant.

episodes.name: Save Our Town
episodes.overview: Gordon revitalizes three businesses in Ellicott City, Md., after flood damage in 2016 and 2018.
